sentences.en: He's been elected to the magistracy.
The magistracy was usually considered a necessary precondition for entry into the Roman Senate.
sentences.cn: 行政官职通常被认为是进入元老院的必要先决条件.

words.tran_cn: 地方法官；文职官员；治安推事
长官的职位；地方行政长官
地方行政官的职位；地方行政长官

trans.tran_cn: 地方行政官，执法官，地方行政官员的职位
trans.tran_en: the official position of a magistrate, or the time during which someone has this position
